rows.label: qst104205_msg0001
rows.name: Yo! I'm just thinkin' 'bout it now!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0002
rows.name: It's not unusable as is, but...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0003
rows.name:
Since it's a place for kids, I
gotta make it sturdy, you know?

rows.label: qst104205_msg0004
rows.name:
Ah, but I wonder if we can
gather the materials...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0005
rows.name: Really?! You're a lifesaver!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0006
rows.name:
Then, right away, I'd like you to
gather the repair materials and
give them to the kids over there.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0007
rows.name:
Wood for Martis, decorations for
Kazuna, and ore for Kukuri!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0008
rows.name:
They're all helping out, saying
they want to build their own
school with their own hands!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0009
rows.name:
For these kids' sake, I'll put my
heart and soul into these repairs!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0101
rows.name:
Wood for Martis, decorations for
Kazuna, and ore for Kukuri!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0102
rows.name:
Once you've got enough,
please let me know!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0201
rows.name:
You got all the materials!
Thank you so much!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0202
rows.name: Alright, let's get to it!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0203
rows.name: ...Uhm.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0204
rows.name: I can't exactly do it right away...

rows.label: qst104205_msg0205
rows.name:
Please go to the village elder
and help out with other things.

rows.label: qst104205_msg0301
rows.name:
Building it together with everyone
makes it so much more rewarding!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0401
rows.name:
A lesson from Rex-sensei...
That's not something you
get to hear every day!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0501
rows.name:
The teachers have finally
gathered, and the village
elder's dream has come true!

rows.label: qst104205_msg0502
rows.name:
I hope they study hard and
grow up to be great adults!
